name: Pooja
greetingText: I really like your name But...!
wishText: I want to be your constant variable.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it, Bcz I want to be your constant variable.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
